title: Encoder Configuration
description: Schema for validating encoder configuration files.

indir.description: Directory where the encoder looks for packages.

outdir.description: Directory where the encoder outputs the encoded files.

bitrate.description: Bitrate is per channel. For mono, it will be the specified bitrate, for stereo, double the specified bitrate.

yes.description: If true, the encoder will not ask for confirmation before re-encoding and overwriting faulty source files. Default is false.

loglevel.description: Logging level. Default is 'info'. Can be 'debug', 'error', or 'silent'.

packages.description: Definition of packages and their specific configurations.

sourcedir.description: Optional. Directory where the sounds for this package are located.

bitrate.description: Optional. Bitrate for this package, overriding the default.

extends.description: Optional. List of packages this one extends from. Currently does nothing.

languages.description: Optional. Language codes and their associated directories.

sources.description: Optional. Specific source files with overridden bitrate or channels.

bitrate.description: Bitrate for this source, possibly overriding the default or package bitrate.

channels.description: Optional. Number of audio channels for this source, default is same number of channels as the source.
